name: ketchersvc
description: Backend service to render molfiles to SVG using Ketcher

scripts.start: npm run build && cp src/.env dist/src/ && node dist/src/app.js
scripts.bundle: npm run lint && npm run build && cp -R package.json package-lock.json src/.env.example dist/src/ && docker buildx bake
scripts.test: npm run build -- -p tsconfig.testing.json && cp tests/.env dist/src/ && node dist/tests/app.test.js
